message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product! I think it's worth at least $120, but to get things started, I'm willing to offer it to you for $110.  What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I think the product is worth around $95 to me. Would you consider lowering the price to $95?
Bob, I understand your position. While I value the product at $100, I'm willing to go down to $98 to make this deal work.  Let's find a middle ground!
